headline.fieldDescription: This is the title / headline displayed
headline.name: ./headline

topbordercolor.fieldDescription: Sets the thick top border color.
topbordercolor.name: ./topbordercolor

description.fieldDescription: This is a summary description of the featured content
description.name: ./description

url.fieldDescription: Sets the url target for the button
url.name: ./imgUrl

urlParams.fieldDescription: Sets the link parameters applied to the url. e.g. param1=value1&param2=value2
urlParams.name: ./imgUrlParams

target.fieldDescription: Sets the window target for the link
target.name: ./imgTarget

anchorTag.fieldDescription: Sets an anchor tag that’s applied to the link generated for the navigation item.
anchorTag.name: ./imgAnchorTag

category.fieldDescription: This is the category / lob header
category.name: ./category

url.fieldDescription: Sets the url target for the button
url.name: ./catUrl

urlParams.fieldDescription: Sets the link parameters applied to the url. e.g. param1=value1&param2=value2
urlParams.name: ./catUrlParams

target.fieldDescription: Sets the window target for the link
target.name: ./catTarget

anchorTag.fieldDescription: Sets an anchor tag that’s applied to the link generated for the navigation item.
anchorTag.name: ./catAnchorTag

invocaFlagCheckbox.fieldDescription: Select checkbox if the configured CTA Button needs to be displayed after sometime.
invocaFlagCheckbox.name: ./invocaFlagCheckbox

title.fieldDescription: Sets the title displayed in the button
title.name: ./ctatitle

url.fieldDescription: Sets the url target for the button
url.name: ./url

urlParams.fieldDescription: Sets the link parameters applied to the url. e.g. param1=value1&param2=value2
urlParams.name: ./urlParams

target.fieldDescription: Sets the window target for the link
target.name: ./target

anchorTag.fieldDescription: Sets an anchor tag that’s applied to the link generated for the navigation item.
anchorTag.name: ./anchorTag

theme.fieldDescription: Sets the theme applied to the link.
theme.name: ./theme

url.fieldDescription: Sets the url target for the button
url.name: ./invocaUrl

urlParams.fieldDescription: Sets the link parameters applied to the url. e.g. param1=value1&param2=value2
urlParams.name: ./invocaUrlParams

target.fieldDescription: Sets the window target for the link
target.name: ./invocaTarget

anchorTag.fieldDescription: Sets an anchor tag that’s applied to the link generated for the navigation item.
